metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20503 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
usrsctp before 2019-12-20 has out-of-bounds reads insctp_load_addresses_from_init.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

chromium-browser - 80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
thunderbird package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '80.0.3987.149-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
